excerpt: "Tyler Sidell, technical program director, sports and entertainment partnerships at IBM, tells me the more than 2.7 million points of data taken before and during the tournament continually feeds updates to the company’s draw analysis, showing a player’s relative path difficulty toward advancing to future rounds."
